channel.title: GAMES - By HAYVN [Drum&Bass] // What's your fav childhood video game?
channel.description:
Whatever did I create. It's Drum&Bass, so if you like my take on that, feel free to check it out. Other than that I'm still on *semi*-hiatus. It's full time but I suck at not making music. So, yeah :sweat_smile:
https://soundcloud.com/hayvn/games
might as well start a convo.
**What's your fav childhood video game?**
_mine is definitely Zelda. my very first tattoo is also going to be a Zelda quote: "Time passes, people move.... Like a rivers flow, it never ends..." but pretty sure I'll get it in Hylian - not sure which version though._

item.title: GAMES - By HAYVN [Drum&Bass] // What's your fav childhood video game?
item.dc:creator: SUFOS
item.description:
Childhood game has to be Super Mario 64. An amazing game! My favorite game of all time is no doubt Skyrim. 100%
(Also great track!)

item.title: GAMES - By HAYVN [Drum&Bass] // What's your fav childhood video game?
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
I have many:

  • Age of Empires 3 (I’m now addicted to Age of Empires 2)
  • Rollercoaster Tycoon 2
  • Thrillville (Off the Rails) for PS2
  • Sims 2
  • Need for Speed Most Wanted for PS2
  • Star Wars Battlefront 2 (2005)
  • Crash Bandicoot Tag Team Racing
  • Assassin’s Creed
  • Minecraft

Read full topic
